unit_rules.name: Priority Objective
unit_rules.text: At the start of the first Battle Round, select an objective. Until the end of the battle, friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ units within 6" may re-roll Wound rolls of 1 against enemy units within range of that objective.

unit_rules.name: Evade and Survive
unit_rules.text: Once per Battle Round, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Melee Distance, it can make a Normal move.
